effect.sun_moon: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.

short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
